thread.title: HSBC May Need More Time to Decide Where It Should Be Based, CEO Says
thread.title_full: HSBC May Need More Time to Decide Where It Should Be Based, CEO Says - WSJ

author: Margot Patrick
title: HSBC May Need More Time to Decide Where It Should Be Based, CEO Says
text:
LONDONâ€”HSBC Holdings PLC may need more time to complete a review of where it should be based, Chief Executive Stuart Gulliver said Thursday.
The British bank had said its board would make a decision by the end of the year on potentially leaving London.
Speaking on the sidelines of a London conference for HSBC clients, Mr. Gulliver said...
